name: pewter
description: Pewter is a refined alloy formed by blending Tin with Copper. Known for its soft, workable nature and a muted, classic luster, pewter has been a favored material for decorative and utilitarian objects since ancient times.

feruchemy.description: Stores physical strength, tapping grants bursts of power.

store.description: This pawn is storing strength into a pewter metalmind, leaving their body frail and sluggish. They tire easily, move slowly, and struggle with physical tasks â€” but bank immense power for future use.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a pewter metalmind, enhancing their strength, endurance, and physical resilience. Their blows hit harder, they shrug off injuries more easily, and their muscles propel them faster across the battlefield.
